# sitsfeats <img src="inst/extdata/img/logo.png" align="right" width="120"/>
R package for extracting metrics from time series of satellite images

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

<!-- TODO: improve this text -->

The goal of the sitsfeats package is to extract temporal metrics from time series derived from satellite images. The metrics implemented in this version are:
  
  - basics: statistics metrics
  - polar: polar metrics

## Installation

You can install the development version of sitsfeats from [github](https://github.com/OldLipe/sitsfeats) with:

``` r
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("oldlipe/sitsfeats")
```
